revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=RFNet |model=APRT-2001g |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/04/2004 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PXP000002 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2312A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060;88E6060-RCJ; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5510;;1; |flags=block diagram |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=11g |default_ssid_regex=^11g$ |default_ip=10.0.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:06:C7 |oui_eth=00:06:C7 |default_ch= }} The [[i-connect AP880G]] and [[Aztech NA8300]] would seem to use the same board as this device.
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual. :A 00:06:C7 ('''RFNet''') OUI is presumed to be used (it's shown on a MAC label affixed to the EUT) - there is support for it within '''WiGLE'''
The power supply shown in the external photos is an unbranded SY-0901 (120VAC ~ 60Hz, 150mA -> 9VDC, 1.0A).
